title: Bobby Is Advised To Hire Security & Get Kidnapping Insurance + Did Amy Paint Over Vandalism In Her Neighborhood?
itunes:title: Bobby Is Advised To Hire Security & Get Kidnapping Insurance + Did Amy Paint Over Vandalism In Her Neighborhood?
description:
Bobby is advised to hire security and get ‘kidnapping insurance’ for an upcoming trip he’s going on. Amy gives an update on the vandalism in her neighborhood. Also, a listener goes head to head with Bobby in “Win Bobby’s Money.”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
